ruleContent:
let uu=baseUrl.replace('https://m.baidu.com',''); result=uu.replace(/[\/\.\_\-\s]/g,''); let url = surl() + uu; let webr = java.ajax(url); webr = rrcheck(url, webr); let pimg = gets('#player-wrap img@src', webr); let yimgs = gets('.ut1_img_content_smallcg@html', webr).replace('ut1_img_content_smallcg', 'lycig'); let jianjie = gets('.posts-inner-details-text,.actor-right-details-images,.posts-inner-details-text@html', webr); let sourl = source.get('av18' + result) + ''; let srcurl = ''; if (!sourl) { java.toast('æ­£åœ¨è§£å¯†ï¼Œè¯·ç¨ç­‰'); let webjs = ` jfun_show_vfc(); $('body .main .container_small center').html()`; webr = java.webView(webr, url, webjs); srcurl = webr.match(/\/\/[^"']+js\/player\/[^"']+php\?id=100_([^"'_]+)_([^"']+)/); if (srcurl) { srcurl = `/${srcurl[1]}/${srcurl[2]}/${srcurl[2]}.m3u8`; source.put('av18' + result, srcurl); } else { srcurl = ''; } } else { srcurl = sourl; } if (srcurl) { srcurl = surl().replace('//', '//fc.') + srcurl; } else { java.longToast('ğŸ’”æœªè·å–åˆ°æ’­æ”¾é“¾æ¥'); } result=` è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å™¨

${rssArticle.title}

${yimgs} ${jianjie}
`
